attributes.description: ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS, SUPER CLEAN VEHICLE THIS VEHICLE IS SOMETHING OUT OF THIS WORLD one owner since new. White, cream leather is like new and finished with Light Oak Fine Woodgrain Trim. Service history with Toyota has been done on schedule and up to date including the last service done with Toyota. FULLY LOADED WITH ALL THE ADDED EXTRAS INCLUDING Side step Tow Bar, Side Steps, Auto Armour Smash and Grab Safety Film, etc. Perfectly looked after by a fanatical previous owner. 4 X TYRES ARE IN GOOD CONDITION It is just so difficult to find such a clean 3.0 DIESEL FORTUNER AUTO AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE, must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE.
attributes.title: 2011 Toyota Fortuner 3.0 D-4D Raised Body Auto

attributes.description: You have seen correctly, 28 114 KMs twenty eight thousand one hundred and fourteen kms Belonged to the most charming lady, She was born in 1940 which makes her 82 years young. Sadly, her eyesight has deteriorated to the point that her family have forced her to give up driving. Massive respect is due for the way she has looked after her vehicle. She bought and paid for it on her own steam and always treated it with the utmost care and respect. ALWAYS GARAGE PARKED, NO FOOD OR ANIMALS HAVE EVER BEEN ALLOWED IN THE CAR EVERY SINGLE SERVICE COMPLETED ONCE A YEAR ON SCHEDULE AND UP TO DATE WITH VOLVO. fully loaded with every extra available including ELECTRIC MEMORY SEAT PACKAGE, Upgraded nappa leather package, VOLVO PARK ASSIST WITH PDC FRONT AND REAR, full multi media package with full smart phone integration, AUTOMATIC DYNAMIC Bi XENON HEADLIGHTS, Auto Armor smash and grab safety film etc, The previous owner has been absolutely fanatical about the way 4 NEW TYRES The T4 is by far the best derivative of the V40, amazing 1.6 liter petrol turbo charged engine offers 140KW of brilliant performance, the perfect balance between performance and economy SUCH A PLEASURE TO DRIVE WITH THIS AUTOMATIC GEARTRONIC. BY FAR THE BEST VALUE V40 WITH CRAZY LOW MILEAGE CURRENTLY AVAILABLE ANYWHERE IN SA must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
